citation.title: What Can We Learn from the Implementation of No Child Left Behind?

blogs.title: RAND Researchers Offer NCLB Prescription
blogs.summary:
If you want to know what researchers who've studied the No Child Left Behind law think about how to improve it, check out this new brief from RAND, the Santa Monica, Calif.-based think tank.

With support from the U.S. Department of Education, RAND researc

author.name: Inside School Research
author.description: Reporter Sarah D. Sparks spent the last five years writing about federal and state education regulations. Now covering education research, she can most often be found with a double-shot mocha in one hand and the latest academic journal in the other. Join her in a discussion of the politics, personalities, and p-values in education studies, and help bring research out of the lab and into the classroom.
